text: Ned Kelly is a 2003 Australian movie directed by Gregor Jordan. The movie shows the life of Ned Kelly who was a famous bushranger in Australia. The movie is based on Robert Drewe's book Our Sunshine. Most of the filming was done at the Little River Earth Sanctuary, Mount Rothwell, near Geelong. Street scenes were filmed in Clunes and Ballarat. Other locations include Broadford, Glenfern, Hepburn Springs and Melbourne. ==Related pages== *Ned Kelly *Ned Kelly (1970 movie) *The Story of the Kelly Gang ==Other websites== *Official site * *Boxoffice information ==References== category:2003 movies Category:Australian biographical movies Category:Australian crime movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies about outlaws Category:Movies based on books Category:Ned Kelly Category:2000s Western (genre) movies Category:Movies set in Australia
title: Ned Kelly (2003 movie)
